messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

missing annual leave allowance sent thursday re notification annual leave days visible resolved hello please can you log ticket assign relevant help with below logged onto but can only days carried out last year looks like days for thank you very much with kind regards sent thursday notification annual leave days visible resolved importance high dear please be advised issue regarding annual leave days being visible resolved should you wish submit any annual leave special leave requests you can follow normal procedure we apologize for any inconveniences might have caused if you were encounter any other issues please let know thank you kind regards ext hub sent wednesday notification annual leave days visible update hello please be advised we still investigating absences issue with high priority meanwhile please note you won be able submit any annual leave special leave requests should you need book any days off within working week please liaise with responsible teams manually update your absence records into germany colombia bogota macedonia if you have any other questions please contact thank you for your collaboration understanding ext hub sent tuesday notification annual leave days visible dear please be advised we still investigating absences issue with high priority meanwhile please note won allow you submit any annual leave special leave requests should you need book any days off within working week please liaise with responsible teams manually update your absence records into germany colombia bogota macedonia if you have any other questions please contact thank you kind regards ext hub sent tuesday notification annual leave days visible dear please be advised annual leave days cannot be seen needs be updated accordingly our engineers investigating issue with high priority we get back you with updates when available please note applies locations should you have any questions please hesitate contact thank you kind regards ext hub

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I'm currently processing the provided text to determine the most appropriate IT ticket category. My focus is on identifying keywords and phrases that clearly indicate whether the request falls under "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," or "Administrative rights." I'll then select the best fit.

**Selecting HR Support Category**

I've analyzed the ticket details, and the recurring themes of "annual leave allowance," "absence issues," and "leave requests" strongly point towards Human Resources. Therefore, I've categorized this as "HR Support."
